title: When Robots Attack
content:
[url=http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/287468]www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/287468[/url]

How is this relevant to Commander Keen?

Well, there are some robots in it that are kinda reminiscent of the Butler Robots from Keen 1, and there are plenty of robots that look like our old buddy Robo Red.

If you liked Keen 5, you'll like this animation.

So it's not really relevant, but I want you folks to see it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] ----------
www.StrifeStrips.com! Woot! We're back, baby!

title: Re: When Robots Attack
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] You're an animation machine.. or a robot.. Awesome stuff once again!

The robot gallery was pretty cool.

Seems you really like Lemon Demon..

Who was the girl in the robot suit? Another LevelLord reference? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: When Robots Attack
content:
Thank god, I was waiting for the next Lemon Demon music video. This one's better animated than the last one, too. A nice *whooosh* up to the sky at the end of the movie would have been cool, but I guess you can't have everything...[url=http://last.fm/users/grafix5000/][img]http://toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobbler.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: When Robots Attack
content:
Dude, Androo is Lemon Demons music video animator.

And yes, a robot: [url=http://cyborg.namedecoder.com/index.php?acronym=Andrew&design=governor3k3]cyborg.namedecoder.com/in...overnor3k3[/url]

title: Re: When Robots Attack
content:
Not all girls in robot-suits are LevelLord. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]



Actually, LevelLord is in fact a robot in a girl-suit. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] ----------

title: Re: When Robots Attack
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Actually, LevelLord is in fact a robot in a girl-suit. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] [hr][/quote]
But that means... Levelord... you LIED to me! You said you were a GOLEM in a girl-suit! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

Now I don't know what to believe. For all I know TMST could be a duck in a rhino's body. And Keen rush could not be a real garg but just a regular 19 year old guy in Finland!
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

My whole world is shattered....-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Blegdandsmeegdbanner60copy.gif[/img][/url]

content:

No, I'm a garg! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] And 18.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: When Robots Attack
content:
Oh, LevelLord's a robot in a girl-suit alright. She just doesn't know it. She THINKS she's a Golem... so I guess she didn't really tell a lie. She was just... misinformed.

content:
